<div class="airport-book-wrap">
	
	<form action="/outbound/search/" class="scform" name="scform" target="_blank" method="get">

					
			<input type="hidden" name="s" value="destinationtab">

		
		<input type="hidden" name="adults" value="[[ skyscannerbox.travellers.adults ]]">
		<input type="hidden" name="children" value="[[ skyscannerbox.travellers.children ]]">
		<input type="hidden" name="infants" value="[[ skyscannerbox.travellers.infants ]]">

		<input type="hidden" name="class" value="[[ skyscannerbox.class ]]">
		<input type="hidden" name="rtn" value="[[ skyscannerbox.trip ]]">
		<input type="hidden" style="color:#333" name="date" value="[[ formatRealDate(bookdeparturedate) ]]">
		<input type="hidden" style="color:#333" name="dateto" value="[[ formatRealDate(bookreturndate) ]]">

		<input type="hidden" name="from" value="[[ airport.IATA ]]" ng-if="timetablepage != 1">
		<input type="hidden" name="to" value="[[ destinationairport.airport.IATA ]]" ng-if="destinationairport && timetablepage != 1">

		<input type="hidden" style="color:#333" name="from" value="[[ departure.IATA ]]" ng-if="timetablepage == 1">
		<input type="hidden" style="color:#333" name="to" value="[[ destination.IATA ]]" ng-if="timetablepage == 1">
	
		<input type="hidden" name="airline" value="[[ openShedule.airline.IATA ]]" ng-if="openShedule" style="color:#333;">
		<input type="hidden" name="departuretime" value="[[ openShedule.departure_time ]]" ng-if="openShedule" style="color:#333;">

		
		<div ng-if="timetablepage == 1" class="airport-book-header" ng-cloak>
			
			Cheapest prices from <span class="airport-hide-mobile">[[ departure.name ]] (</span>[[ departure.IATA ]]<span class="airport-hide-mobile">)</span> 

			<span ng-if="destination"> 

			 to <span class="airport-hide-mobile">[[ destination.name ]] (</span>[[destination.IATA]]<span class="airport-hide-mobile">)</span>
			
			</span>

			<img style="height: 18px; margin-top: 2px; float: right;" src="/img/skyscanner3_small.png">

		</div>

		<div ng-if="timetablepage != 1" class="airport-book-header" ng-cloak>

			Cheapest prices from <span class="airport-hide-mobile">[[ airport.name ]] (</span>[[ airport.IATA ]]<span class="airport-hide-mobile">) </span>

			<span ng-if="destinationairport"> 

			 to <span class="airport-hide-mobile">[[ destinationairport.airport.name ]] (</span>[[destinationairport.airport.IATA]]<span class="airport-hide-mobile">)</span>
			
			</span>

			<img style="height: 18px; margin-top: 2px; float: right;" src="/img/skyscanner3_small.png">

		</div>





		<div class="airport-book-inner-wrap">
			
			<div class="airport-book-wrap-class airport-hide-mobile">
				
			    <div class="airport-book-item" ng-click="openSkyscannerDropdown($event)" ng-cloak>
			    	
			    	<div style="width: 100%;">[[ skyscannerbox.class ]]</div>

			    	<div><i class="fa fa-angle-down" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>

			    </div>

			    <div class="airport-book-dropdown">

			    	<md-radio-group ng-model="skyscannerbox.class">
	    		
				    	<md-radio-button class="airport-no-outline" value="Economy" aria-label="Label Economy" ng-click="closeSkyscannerDropdown($event)">

	  						Economy

						</md-radio-button>

						<md-radio-button class="airport-no-outline" value="Premium" aria-label="Label Premium economy" ng-click="closeSkyscannerDropdown($event)">

	  						Premium economy

						</md-radio-button>

						<md-radio-button class="airport-no-outline" value="Business" aria-label="Label Business" ng-click="closeSkyscannerDropdown($event)">

	  						Business

						</md-radio-button>

						<md-radio-button class="airport-no-outline" value="Firstclass" aria-label="Label First class" ng-click="closeSkyscannerDropdown($event)">

	  						First class

						</md-radio-button>

				    </md-radio-group>	

			    </div>



			</div>

			<div class="airport-book-wrap-direction airport-hide-mobile">
				
				<div class="airport-book-item" ng-click="openSkyscannerDropdown($event)" ng-cloak>
			    	
			    	<div style="width: 100%;">[[ skyscannerbox.trip ]]</div>

			    	<div><i class="fa fa-angle-down" aria-hidden="true"></i></div>

			    </div>

				 <div class="airport-book-dropdown">

			    	<label>Sort</label>

			    	<md-select ng-model="uiinterface.sortdestination" class="sorttext">
			        	
			        	<md-option ng-click="orderDestinations('', '')" value="none"><em>None</em></md-option>

			        	<md-option ng-click="orderDestinations('city_name', 'asc')" value="Name asc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-alpha-asc"></i> Name a-z</em></md-option>
			        	
			        	<md-option ng-click="orderDestinations('city_name', 'desc')" value="Name desc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-alpha-desc"></i> Name z-a</em></md-option>
			        	
			        	<md-option  ng-click="orderDestinations('country', 'asc')" value="Country asc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-alpha-asc"></i> Country a-z</em></md-option>
			        	
			        	<md-option  ng-click="orderDestinations('country', 'desc')" value="Country desc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-alpha-desc"></i> Country z-a</em></md-option>

			        	<md-option  ng-click="orderDestinations('common_duration', 'asc')" value="Common_duration asc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-numeric-asc"></i> Shortest flight</em></md-option>

			        	<md-option  ng-click="orderDestinations('common_duration', 'desc')" value="Common_duration desc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-sort-numeric-desc"></i> Longest flight</em></md-option>

			        	<md-option  ng-click="orderDestinations('no_routes', 'desc')" value="No_routes desc"><em><i class="sortorder fa fa-road"></i> Biggest airport</em></md-option>

			      </md-select>

		      			.airport-content-destination-new-route, .airport-content-destination-next-flight, .airport-content-destination-new-airline {

		      				background-color:#777;

		      				color:#fff;

		      				font-weight: 500;
		      			}

		      			}

 print{.hide-print:not(.show-print):not(.show){display:none!important}}

</style>
    <!-- Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics -->
<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-38317519-29"></script>
<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
  gtag('js', new Date());

  gtag('config', 'UA-38317519-29');

var trackOutboundLink = function(url) {
  gtag('event', 'click', {
    'event_category': 'outbound',
    'event_label': url,
    'transport_type': 'beacon',
    'event_callback': function(){document.location = url;}
  });
}
  
</script>
